values:
Ohmygosh, i seriously go out with xaviera every single week.
It's like a weekly thing already. ahahahaha.
Anyways, met her today at tm at like 11 plus plus? Goodness, her dad was super funny.
We went up to the cinema to get our tickets first. zomg, like half the timings are selling fast? -scary-
So then we wanted a later timing but the seats were like, not that good. We settled with 12 pm.
Teehee, so that girl wanted to go to ntuc or fairprice to get her chips so we rushed all the way down. 
Got her chips and rushed alll the way up again to get my popcorn. That darhling was so impressed that such a biggggggg cup of drink only cost $2.80. ahaha. 

The movie disappointed me greatly. The worse harry potter movie i've seen. -sigh-
I won't deny that some parts were done well, however however the movie moved so fast. 
In the first part of the movie, it already went through like, 3 to 4 chapters of the book?
The whole entire thing wasn't elaborated enough and it didn't have the -omg, what's going to happen next?!- feeling to it. It was mostly predictable. So then, i'm wondering, is it the book content fault? or is it the new director's fault?  And seriously, i think order of the phoniex was the most elaborated book in the whole entire series. Okay, i'm settling it with the director's fault. He didn't follow the previous movies at all.
There was this one scene sirius's head popping out from the fire? In order of the phoniex, the director made the faded image of sirius's face. It was like the fire was covering his face. Like there was a gap in between. But if you look at the goblet of the fire movie, sirius used the exact same method  to talk to harry. HOWEVER, in goblet of fire, it seemed like the fire had a face shape. Its like two completely different things when the method is actually the same. Weird i guess. 
When sirius died, that was the worst part. Come on, sirius was harry's last and closest kin. And when he died, harry showed so little emotion. I mean, not little, not elaborated enough. So yeah. 

DRACO MALFOY IS JUST HOT PLEASE. EFFING HOT. 
xDDDDDDD. it was like, everytime he appeared, i just melted. ahahaha. 
hot stuff lah.  -i'm crazy over malfoy- But he appeared in so little scenes. -badbad-

Okay, so after the movie, me and xaviera went around tm and cs to look for spongebob boxers. We found some, but they were freaking ex. So we headed to bugies street to look for the 2 for $15 boxers. OMG. All super cute:D  We bought the exact same one. 

                                                                                         

Mhm, isn't it just so cute?  teehee:D [spongebob is love!]
Oh wells, after that we went to bugis junction cause the weather was so freaking hot. -global warming
Had coffee at tcc. yummy yummy. goodness, xaviera has a weird way with words. Today at tcc, she said "my battery no camera" when actually, she wanted to say "my camera no battery" HAHAHA. funny stuff man.
Had this super funny conversation with her at tcc. Laughed like crazy. 
I bought my chip and dale file today! I have so many at home. heeee:DD

Yesterday was the syf celebration thingy. I so do not regret going. ohmygosh, darn fun! 
The whole co was dancing, moving with each other. We had manymany laughs too.
:DDD took many many peektures. Sadly, myy cammy died halfway, so  i have limited peektures. I'll upload the rest when jaclyn sends them to mee. For now, look at the ones i have.

                                                                                         

   

   

    

   

   

   

       

No more. My cam died after that. And i just charged it okay!  oh wells. my cam's lousy.
I gotta go already. ohs, last note.

-my dear xaviera, i loveeeee going out with you please. every week, non stop. zomg. so fun.
anyways, spongebob boxers are love! ;D i'm wearing it now! ahahahaha. loveyou honeyyy!

-baby, i'm not sweet at all. It's only a shirt. My friends think you're sweeeeet. ahahaha. i love you lah. ;D
ps: i carry your present to school, everyday. Go guess why. ahahaha:D

-my dear desi. I MISS YOU LAH. omg. superrrrrr long never talk to you please. Promise we'll stay close friends. teeheee. i'm writing a letter for you nowwwwww. :DD. let's go out sometime. heee. xD
loveyou darhlingg!

ILOVEYOU!

Without a doubt, baby i do i do.
It's been a month, and i feel more each day.
Sometimes i feel dejected and emotional, then i think of you.

You put a smile on my face, you seriously do.
And sometimes i dont talk to you for a while, sorry sweetheart.
But you just need to know that from the bottom of my heart, iloveyou.
Trust me, i definately do.

-and baby, i thank god each day for your presence, your love. 
iloveyou!

[happy one month baby]

Sunday, 8th july

Went out with xaviera dearest. OMG. we almost combed the entire orchad can. I forgot where we went but i remembered we went borders. -yay- I finally got my borders pencil case and notebook. Super expensive lah.
Oh wells. Then we went far east. ;DD  Made someone's shirt. -i'm going to get vulgar- wtf lah, the man there, touch my hand and my shoulder and my face. wah lao. want touch, go gelang touch lah. Got so many there, can choose somemore. wth, i hate strangers who are guys to touch me. EEEEEEYER. cant stand it. 

-darhling, four more days. pretty fast aint it? teehee. iloveyoumanymany dearest. ps: my gran's asking for another four numbers from me. She seemed to think the numbers i gave were lucky. hahaha.

Xaviera, thanks for always being there. I realised i tell you the most things. Hahahaha. 
The most serious and most random things. You'll never fail to help if i've problems. You seriously help with everything. About her, someone, and whatever problems i have. 
Omg, what will i do without you huh?
ahahahahaha. My best budddeeey lah you:D
No secrets between us kay? teeheeeeee. You rock girl. helping me with someone's present.
HEH:D
You rock lah, seriously.

loveyoumany. heee:D

I didn't go to school today. Guess why?
I didn't wake up:D ahahahaha. smart right? -shermeen's mommy didn't wake up too-
So i spent the day, shoppingxD  My mommy brought me. Thank goodness the teacher didn't call me.

I totally hate you, idiot.
Would you please, please just go away?
Don't piss me off further. please.
I don't want us to fall out and not be friends.

-baby, nine more days. Fast aint it? teehee. nine nine nine. and oh darhling, my gran struck 4d with the number i gave her. Wanna guess the number? -ahahaha- loveyoumanymany dearest:D

[ take my hand, run with me. Lie here and forget the world, cause i don't want to remember anything but you]

OMG!

Went out with someone todayyyy:D
And right, someone has the pretty boy look! Seriously, it's super obvious okay.
This is the only time i've went to orchad seeing so many ah-lians. And not pretty ones too. -sigh-
Watched transformers with someone. Gosh, it's uber nice, but then super noisy. -bang here bang there-
Haiyoooo. So then yeap, someone had to leave cause someone had tuition. 
MAN, i didn't get to play someone's psp. Not fair at all nehs.

Pretty boyyyyyyyyy. ahhaahahahha. MINE:D

-dearest, thanks for the present:D You remembered i like chip and dale eh? hahaha. Anyways, thanks for today:D I'm so so sorry i didn't get your present today. Really really sorry. Anyway, you have the super pretty boy look:D Still, iloveyoumanymany dearest:D

Everyone's asking me for a photo. I don't have one. And, even if i do, i won't show itttttttt:D

Friday, 29th june

Dinner-ed with tammy and jason. We met at around 7-ish and we didn't get a place to eatc till about 8 plus. It was horrible. We were walking around like lost puppies. And i swear that jason is so irrtating. RAWWWR.
Anyways, we decided to have dinner at nydc. The food was good, and the portion was just right too. I guess i was hungry:D So then after dinner, we walked alllll the way to ps. Because tammy wanted to see someone. Yes, someone. But then when we got there, we didn't see someone. I did though:D We were up looking at the movie timings and gosh, all full up! Went to gelare to egt a drink and goodness, that jason was so nice okay! He treat us drinks:DDD ahahahaha. Thanks jason! Yeap, gossiped like super a lot then went home. It was scary please.

Sunday, 1st july

Went out with darling qian qian yesterday. Hahahaha, we met at tm and i bumped into angeline and marcus. Not bad eh. i met like how many thousand people yesterday. Thank god someone didn't go. I'll just die. Me and qian qian just walked all the way to cs to watch a movie, nancy drew, since the tm was a really really relly long queue. Nancy drew is okay, and the guy in it, ned or whatever his name is, he's somewhat hot:D After the movie we went to take neoprints! OMG. DIDN'T TAKE THOSE FOR SUPER LONG! Had coffee bean after that.
My parents came and they brought us to watch die hard 4.0. OMGOMG. Die hard 4.0 was super nice okay! :DDD ahahaha. Took another round of neoprints after that:D I haven't uploaded my neoprints yet but i'll upload two peektures we took yesterday. We wanted to take more but there was no camera. Sad. Oh wells, we'll take it another time. 

     

This was the neos that qian qian had to bring home. We were in a rush. So yeap, she'll pass it to me another time:D



Nice eh? I'll upload the other neos another day. Off to meet someoneeeeeeeeee:DDD. 
Bye!

I wanna go drinking. And the people just had to go today and tempt me.
But i can't go.  -sigh-
Because someone forbids me to gooooo.
Someone said its bad for my health. rawwwwr.
Nevermind, i'll be darn guai and listen.

I've finished my bio homework! YAY! :D
Maybe i'll learn from hani and date my homework tomorrow. 
If not it'll be so lonely.

Perfect, that's soooo  the word to describe my life right now. 
Maybe a part of my life is perfect, considering someone:D
The rest of it is just a jumbled mess to end with. 

Emotional. Some part of me just cannot take it anymore. I can't live with people like that.
Living in the past. Weren't you the one that told me we had to always look to the future? 
Forget the past, live the present and plan the future? Wasn't that your ultimate goal in life?
i guess you're just being an jerk right now. Who said you could wait for me?
Who said you were worth it to give up someone? Who said you had the right to 'love' me?
It ends now, officially. All this crap has been divided from me, my world. You can live in your secluded world, where i 'loved' you. Cut yourself from the world, live in misery and a world coloured in back and white. You can't enter my life again, i won't let you. It was all just a mistake to begin with. But then you, yes you. If you continue to live in that world of yours, you'll never be able to see the world's colours and the magic it holds, its ever so beautiful majestic view. Last thing, dont come near me, or any of my precious ones. 

School is just plain irritating, its like, the holidays don't feel long enough and they give us endless homework. And now, they drag us back to school. This monday. -sigh- I attempted to do my math homework just now. I then realised how bad and horrible i was at math? Cause i couldn't do a single sum. I guess its time for tuition. I hate school so much. I mean, everyone does. But at least they're better than me. I can't do well in my studies for nuts. This end of year is going to be crazy. I better be promoted to sec four, if not, i'll just kill myself. 

I need this year to end, fast. I need to graduate from cca. Its driving me crazy. I cannot even play for god's sake, and now, i have to play in combines. Tell me, how much does that suck? A lot i know. And its not like i ain't putting in the effort. I am. But the thing is, how fast do you expect me to learn? It's not like i'm superwoman or something. -sigh- Maybe i should quit cca.

Ilovehani, she's always so sweet. Always there for me, standing up for me. She always has countless advice for me. Whenever i'm feeling low, she'll always be there. From friends to someone to cca to studies and basically everything, she'll be there for me. I'll be there for you too hani! You'll my best girl for eternity:D
<3333

My jie! She's super uberrrrrr nice lah. Whenever i tell her some of my problems, she'll never fail to comfort me or give me advice. Although we dont communicate much, but i know she'll always be there for me. I'll be there for you too jie! love you!  <33

I dont need to say anything about someone. Some people should know. Heh:D 
love you darhling! <33333

It's been one week love.
I hope it means something to you, 
cause it means so much to me(:

But i need something much deeper than that, 
I need to be reassured.
of a 

Certainty;

iloveyou baby:D

Come on, i didnt say my granny couldn't spoil the stuff in the house okay?
I just sighed. Whats so wrong with that?
And please, when i told her she had to inform mommy first, i wasn't being rude or naughty okay?
I mean seriously, when you want to fix something. Dont you have to tell the person?
Gosh.

FAILED ATTEMPT AT TRYING TO MEET SOMEONE. He forgot to reply my message. And i was right at serangoon mrt. -sigh- nevermind darhling, we'll have another attempt:D

loveeeyou!

JOEY! : DARHLING! i loveee your comment eh. It really encouraged me. Thanks a lot eh babe? 
              I LOVE YOU! 

I have a splitting headache. I shall end here. BYE(:

i know your presence is clear to me. The words you use on me. 
ily darhling:D

DONT

I super feel like crying now.
I feel so much pain for hani. She has to wear spectacles.
I've never seen her this depressed, angry, trubled, annoyed, or rather, in this state.
It hurts me inside to know what she's going through, what she's feeling.
I totally know what she's going through, and i myself was super shocked when she told me.
I feel so much for her.

-fiona darhling, i know what you're going through now. And i understand. I know you'll face obstacles and all, but yes, no matter what, i'll be here for you. These five words i swear to you. It breaks me to see you in this state. I'm sorry for what has happened. And to know that you cried, i know this matter is serious. You dont cry easily fiona. I know that. I'll pray for you. Tons and tons of prayers. Iloveyoualways:D

I hate you, so much
Why can't you just leave me alone?
We're not together anymore boy, and we never will.
I'm happy, so much happier with my other.
So stop being a total joker here.
Get lost, scram. I hate you, dont you see?
I was nothing but a fling.
A doll, nothing more to you
Something you played with, to amuse thee.
But now i'm free with angel's wings.

Just when you know there's someone new,
you want me back too.
How annoying and fustrating can you get?
You pester me and make me depise you.
And thats just one tenth of  what you did to us
No correction, there was no us, there was just you.
All along.

Screw you, piss off.
I dont fucking understand you.
I really really don't.
One minute youre hot, the next you're cold.
Look i dont really care, just get away from fold.
I'm happy now, dont need you to ruin it.
I dont care about you anymore, there's someone else for me to care about.

Just stay away from me. forever.

sean,
         what we have is gone. Its no point trying to chase back a train thats already gone. Just let it leave, let me go. Some people hang on, when they're supposed to let go. I guess you're one of that some. You need to change. Seriously. One word for you, goodbye.

-to my special someone:D

Please my dearest people around me, 
How long can you close me up in that locked up cage?
Someday i'll break through those prison bars and find my own righted freedom
Burst forth, go wild, something you've never seen.
Come, dont be daft, dont be so sure, dont be so sure i wont leave you here.

so stop judging me in that judgemental cage
just heck it, let me be. i've been like that, always will be.
How long, how long can you restrict me from feeling what i'm feeling?
How many years can you forfeit me from feeling love?
I'm feeling it now, dont stop me. Dont try.
Its not like you werent there in that scene, somewhat 20 something years ago.
You have, you have, i know its true.
I know you know how hard it is to reject it. And you had your first at 15.
So just set me free, let me be. 
You always say you dont want me to fall. Rest assured, its happened so many times. This time, i wont fall.
Your daughter is strong enough, capable enough. 
I'm not that little girl with two ponytails relying on you, every single time. 
Sure i'll still be your little girl, but i'm grown.
Stuff and issues, do change.
iloveyou mommy, i always will:D

Finally got that off my head. Stuff cropped up today, and my emotions aren't really. stable right now.
I need some time. I need my friends, i need someone. 

Someone went to camp or something today, and its overnight. DARN. Means someone cannot use computer, which means, someone cannot come online, which also means, i cannot talk to someone. HOW SAD.

-i'll be sitting in my room, staring up at the sky and thinking of you:D

I didn't know you'll go the extra mile for me:D
But thanks, it was so sweeeeeet of you!

Btw, lucks for your camp tomorrow my dear!
:D




lovelovelovelovelovelovelovelovelove is a wonder to me.

Words can't say what a love can do

 So much for love, a simple journey that takes forth.
The symbol of love, heart felt shape, for you and me it was made.
Held in my hands outstretched to you, oh my love, won't you keep it close to you?

           Love is a way of life on a carousel, round and round, on and on. 
As a shooting star shoots up into the sky, lighting up the evening's shine, promise me darling, we'll stay forever. So round and round we go on the carousel, in our little world.



-in simpler words, you're my closest thing to magic and what we have is beyond that.  
-iloveeeeeeeeeeeeeyou:DD

Today's pure love! Stuff happened(: ahahahahha.
Oh wells. Met marcus for lunch today. Apparantly, he's at j8 almost everytime i go there. Ahahaha, ri what.
Then, we decided to eat at the aircon places, however, the places are flooded with ri people. So yeah, settled at the bubble tea shop, with one group of raffles people. Staring at us. -scary-

Daddy fetched me from work. I'm such a lucky girl(: Went to the place near home to get food. Didn't go to mommy's though, Daddy said it was too far. rawrrr. 

Anyways, sweeeeeeeeet stuff happened to meeeee!
hahahahahaahhahahahahahha=DDD

ILOVEMYBOY(:

Today was suppperrr productive. I managed to learn a lot of new things. But then, the steps are like, woah, super difficult to remember. Oh wellls. 

TERI GOT THROUGH THE FIRST ROUND OF CAMPUS SUPERSTAR!! -cheers- must support her okay? She's frreaking good! -cheers and runs around the room-

Last thing, ILOVEYOUHONEEEEY!

Its totally the shopping madness now! I just went shopping with my mom like how many times. Totalllyyy fun!

Saturday, 9th june
We went to brunch first at some weird place, The food was goooood(:
Anyways, headed to northpoint after that. Wow, that place is good for shopping! Hahahaha. Bought two watches and some earrings. Prettayyyy!
Went home after that.
Next next, we headed to suntec city for dinnerr and movie!  Well, we watched the pirates(: Second time for me!
Again, JACK SPARROW IS SO HOT. and at a second look, WILL TURNER IS HOT TOO. Hahahaha. I stayed for that bonus scene. Wth, cheat my feelings. Then i waited so long for the scene; the credits were superrrrr long! Oh wells, the song was nice. Then yeah, before the movie, i shopped at carrefour. Bought two fbt's, one fbt shirt, two tees and  a pair of slippers. A lot, i know(:

Sunday, 10th june
I LOVED TODAY(:

-I love you, how much do these three words mean?
Significant aren't they? When you say them to me. 
Baby, you'll never know how much these three words mean to me.
I just want you to hold me close to you when i stray far from you. Stay with me please my darhling.

-when you breathe, i want to be the air for you. i want to be your living essential, your everything. i love you,  these three words i  swear to you.

-For without thee, life's incomplete.
 For without thee, i cannot breathe.
 For without thee, i'll crumble into a thousand pieces of glass.
 Because of thee, i come to love again.

Monday, 4th june

Had co yesterday right smack in the morning.  Oh well. I ran around the whole entire morning lah. 
Trying to collect costume and whatnot. -sigh- Then some people, dont even care. -sigh-
I'm super proud of my section today. Very very proud of them(:
None of them were late, didnt talk during fall in and didnt really slack. THREE CHEERS FOR MY DARHLING SECTION. HIP HIP HURRRAY! HIP HIP HURRRAY!  HIP HIP HURRRAY!
-runs around the room screaming-

Saturday, 2nd june

HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO JASMIN, HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO JASMIN, HAPPY BIRTHDAY HAPPY BIRTHDAYYYYYYYY, HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOUUUUUU! 

Hahahaha, yesterday was darhling's birthday(: I super wished her with eight missed calls and god knows how many messages and how many thousand nudges. Nice birthday present eh? Hahhaahahaa. Darhling, i hope whatever you wished for before your beautiful birthday cake comes true alright? And oh, i hope you do get that desktop you want for a present(:  Once again, happy birthday darhling!

Sunday, 3rd june

Today was rather hectic. Woke up and found out that nobody was home. I thought i was sleeping at some weird place. Oh wells. Kept the clothes then watched some tellly. Again, the telly and the computer always gets me stuck. So, i was late for church.

Going into church was a total new experience and somewhat a weird scene. For me myself, not going for about 7 months? Woah, just suddenly appearing in church makes me feel weird. Sacrament was okay i guess, not many people went up to bear their testimony. What happened after the sacrament meeting was horrible. Bishop came to talk to me and sooooo many people wanted me to stay for the classes. I cant stay, i already know that what i'm learning in there, is not true. The history and all. How can they expect me to go for a class in which i dont believe what they;re teaching. Young woman is fine you know, its not history. Its just sunday school. And sunday school is before young woman, so i left. Grabbed some food before leaving. Hell, i was hungry. 

Because you didnt tell them, because you werent truthful. I act like a puppet right in front of them. Dont you understand how hard it is for me? Yes we arent together no more, but hey, the feelings arent gone yet. Do you not know how hard it is to stand in front of you, talk to you, laugh with you and act like nothing's wrong? Do you not know how much my heart aches when i see you, with or without the other girl? Do you not understand what i feel for you? Did you not know how much i felt for you, gave you? She gave you up, broke up with you and so much more, and now you want me back? Why play with my feelings? I aint a toy, aint some doll you play with. The feelings you evoke in me are real. So real that when the feelings are broken, i feel hurt. I feel so much hurt you'll never understand. I gave you my heart, gave you so much more, only for you to play with. Not once, but twice. Maybe you forgot something, i did love you, and i still love you.

DRACO MALFOY aka TOM FELTON. -screams and runs aorund the room in circles-
My husband eh! I realised i have so many. HAHAHA. And, i'm a little behind time to like D.M, but oh who cares, i share the same interests with jasmin aka darhling and joey. YAY(:



AHA! See, my husband! AHAHAHA, oh wells. I love a lot of people(:

My rendang island trip. Is cancelled.
Screw that bloody woman who cancelled it, and dues who is it?
Some stupid outsider from god knows where lah. I was looking forward to the beach? And the tanning and all the super fun beach stuff, and that woman just HAD to cancel it. Smack her face i tell you. God dammit!

Hani's out with her audi friends. I'm kind of trying to include her in all my posts(: Hahahahaha; Hani isn't replying my message! RAHS. Oh wells. I'm watching CSS2 on youtube now. God! That 13 year old boy, shawn i think, He's freaking good lah! He sounds like a professional to me and then, he has that cute cute face at the same time. Not bad eh. Hahahaha. I'll still support my school! TERI JIAYOU!

-mommy mommy, i'm sorry for not being that lil' girl who was good in her languages. I promise i'll work hard for eoy and get better results. I'll work on my math and prove myself worthy for tp and prove myself to those who look down on me. mommy mommy, i promise i won;t let you down. I'll work hard(:

Oh wells, been emo lately. And i'm going to work next week. Gotta earn cash! Hahahahaha. I realised, i have like a thousand things to buy after that de stress operation i had with jasmin. SEE! All her fault! Hahahahaha, kiddddding.

I shall go on a trip with my math assesment. SOOOOOOO fun eh? Till then, tooodles!

OH.MY.GOD. I slept till like. I.45PM today.

That's like, 12 hours of sleep. I must have been frraking tired.
